creator: peterj@liberate.com
text:
The Zip task (and those that extend it, like Jar) add parent directory entries
for all of the files.  This differs from Sun's jar tool, which only adds
META-INF/ as the parent of MANIFEST.MF.

I propose (and will attach a patch) to add a boolean 'filesonly' attribute to
Zip that will omit these directories when desired.  filesonly will initially be
'false' to keep backwards compatibility.
